name: Challenge: Have a Card Up Your Sleeve
short_description:
This is a Dice News coding challenge. We're looking for you to write a computer program in C#, C++ or Java to solve a programming problem.

If you want to enter, you must submit your code via email to dhbolton@hotmail.com with the subject "Dice Coding Challenge 2" by January 31st, 2014.

The challenge is based on the card game Sevens. To enter, you must write a program that can take a turn in the game. Your program will play against two or three other programmers', and will be called to choose a card to play each time it becomes your turn.

The program must be able to read a file that contains your hand of cards and the current state of the game and return a file that contains the suit and value of the card it has selected to play.

For more details on the program and how to enter, visit news.dice.com
summary: This is the second coding challenge in a new series by Dice News
